iep_smart_goal: By the end of the semester, the child will use two-word combinations (e.g., 'want cookie') to request objects during playtime in 80% of opportunities.
suggested_activity: Object Requesting Game: Child must combine two symbols (e.g., 'Want' + 'Ball') to get the item.

iep_smart_goal: The child will correctly produce the /p/ sound in the initial position at the word level with 80% accuracy during structured activities.
suggested_activity: Popping Bubbles: Child says 'Pop' or 'Push' to trigger a bubble animation.

iep_smart_goal: By the end of the school year, the child will use a slow speech rate during structured activities to reduce stuttering occurrences by 50%.
suggested_activity: Turtle Talk: A game where the character moves only when the child speaks slowly.

iep_smart_goal: By the end of the quarter, the child will initiate greetings with peers (e.g., 'hi', 'hello') in 4 out of 5 opportunities during free play.
suggested_activity: Morning Greeter: Child drags the 'Hello' emoji to different characters to wake them up.

iep_smart_goal: Within six months, the student will define grade-level vocabulary words and use them appropriately in sentences with 80% accuracy.
suggested_activity: Word Builder: Child matches a word to its definition picture and records a sentence.

iep_smart_goal: By the end of the semester, the student will correctly produce the /r/ sound in all positions at the word level with 90% accuracy.
suggested_activity: Roaring Racer: Car speeds up only when the /r/ sound (e.g., 'Run', 'Race') is pronounced correctly.

iep_smart_goal: Within three months, the student will use light articulatory contacts while reading aloud, achieving 85% fluency.
suggested_activity: Feather Touch: Visual feedback shows a feather floating; if the child speaks too hard/tensely, the feather falls.

iep_smart_goal: Within three months, the student will identify and explain the emotions of characters in a short story with 80% accuracy.
suggested_activity: Emotion Detective: Child watches a video clip and selects the correct emotion emoji for the character.

iep_smart_goal: Over the next quarter, the student will make inferences about character motivations in a story and justify their reasoning in a group discussion.
suggested_activity: Mystery Solver: Child reads a clue and records voice notes explaining 'Why' the character did it.

iep_smart_goal: Within six months, the student will track their own fluency patterns using a self-monitoring checklist in 4 out of 5 sessions.
suggested_activity: Speech Journal: After a speaking task, the user rates their own fluency on a slider (1-5).

iep_smart_goal: By the end of the school year, the student will participate in a mock job interview, demonstrating appropriate eye contact and clear speech.
suggested_activity: Interview Simulator: An AI avatar asks questions, and the camera tracks eye contact while recording answers.
